text: When any number of your [Car] Officer and/or [Car] Treachery personnel are about to be stopped by a dilemma, discard the top three cards of your deck to prevent that.

name: Finding Our Way *VP
text: To play this event, you must not command a headquarters mission. Plays on your {Caretaker's Array}. Cards an opponent owns cannot prevent or destroy this event. When a card instructs you to place a personnel on your headquarters mission, that personnel may be placed aboard your [Voy] ship instead. Order - Discard a card from hand to download a [Voy] ship. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Ilia Finest Navigator in Starfleet *VP
text: You may play this personnel at cost -2 to ignore her next ability. When you play this personnel, if you command a [TOS] personnel who has a cost of 4 or more, for each headquarters mission your opponent commands, you may shuffle two cards from your discard pile into your deck.

name: Jean-Luc Picard Genial Captain
text: When you play this personnel, you may download {U.S.S. Enterprise-D}.

name: The Sword of Kahless *VP
text: Each of your Klingons and Honor personnel present is Integrity -2, Cunning +1, and Strength +2.

name: Ressikan Flute *VP
text: Plays in your core. Order - Stop your personnel who has Integrity>6 to take an event from your discard pile into your hand.

name: Thought Maker *VP
text: Plays in your core. When you have drawn dilemmas, you may search your dilemma pile for a copy of one of your overcome dilemmas and add it to those drawn. Shuffle and replace your dilemma pile face down.

name: Kira Nerys Colonel Kira *VP
skills: Diplomacy Honor Leadership Officer Programming Security
text: While this personnel is present with your [Fed] personnel, each of your other [Baj] personnel present is attributes +1.

name: B'Elanna Torres Straightforward Engineer *VP
text: Order - If this personnel is aboard your ship, discard a card from hand to remove a Damage card from that ship. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Pavel A. Chekov Young Navigator *VP
text: You may play this personnel at cost +1 to return a [TOS] personnel you command to his or her owner's hand.

name: Quark Little Green Man *VP
text: While this personnel is present with a [Pa] personnel, he is attributes +1 and gains Acquisition, Diplomacy, and Treachery.

name: Vash Treasure Hunter *VP
text: When you play this personnel, you may place a card from your discard pile on the bottom of your deck, then draw a card (or, if {Jean-Luc Picard} is at this mission, draw two cards instead).

name: Phlox Alien Physiologist *VP
text: When your personnel present is about to be killed, you may stop this personnel to prevent that and place that personnel on your headquarters where he or she could be played.

name: Energize *VP
text: Plays in your core. At the start of each of your turns, place the top card of your deck on this event. The first non-[TNG] personnel you play each turn is cost -2 for each card on this event.

name: Olarra
text: While your [NA] Hologram with no staffing icons is aboard this ship, he or she gains [Stf]. While you have a lower score than each of your opponents and a Hologram personnel is aboard this ship, you may spend an additional counter this turn.

name: Olarra *VP
text: While your [NA] Hologram with no staffing icons is aboard this ship, he or she gains [Stf]. While you have a lower score than each of your opponents and a Hologram personnel is aboard this ship, you may spend an additional counter this turn.

name: Sumek
text: While you command three [Fed] personnel, this personnel gains Biology and Officer, and becomes [Fed].

name: Garren
text: While you command three [Rom] personnel, this personnel is attributes +1, gains Engineer, and becomes [Rom].

name: K'wov
text: While you command three [Kli] personnel, this personnel is attributes +1, gains Leadership, and becomes [Kli].

name: Doran
text: While you command three [Car] personnel, this personnel is attributes +1, gains Archaeology, and becomes [Car].

name: Automated Server
text: While you command three [Fer] personnel, this personnel is attributes +1, gains Acquisition, and becomes [Fer].

affiliation: Any affiliation may attempt this mission.
name: Alpha 5 Approach Transport Crash Survivor
text: When a player's personnel begin a mission attempt with five or less personnel, the player to the left of that player may draw six extra dilemmas and spend six extra on dilemmas.

name: Dark Page
text: Choose a personnel who has Anthropology or Exobiology to be stopped. If you cannot, randomly select a personnel to be killed.

name: Persistent Strike
text: Plays in your core. Order - Begin an engagement involving your Officer personnel. If you win, place this event on an opponent's ship involved. Otherwise, destroy this event. Damage - If this is a non-[Voy] ship, ignore its game text.

name: Mark of Gideon (ID)
text: Randomly select a personnel to be stopped. If you still have nine personnel remaining, return that personnel to his or her owner's hand, then your opponent chooses a second personnel to return to his or her owner's hand. If you still have ten personnel remaining, your opponent chooses a third personnel to return to his or her owner's hand.

name: Pillage and Plunder
text: Choose a personnel who has Archaeology or Treachery to be stopped. If you cannot, randomly select a personnel to be killed.

name: The First Duty
text: Choose a personnel who has Honor or Law to be stopped. If you cannot, randomly select a personnel to be killed.

name: A Private Little War
text: Randomly select a personnel to be stopped. Unless you have Honor, Medical, Science and Integrity>32 or Engineer, Security, Treachery and Strength>32, randomly select a second personnel to be stopped and your opponent may download an equipment.

name: In Development
text: For each headquarters mission you command, this dilemma is cost -1. Randomly select a personnel who has a cost of 2 or less. All your other personnel who have a cost of 2 or less are stopped.

name: Setting the Stage
text: Randomly select nine personnel. All your other personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: The Clown: Go Away
text: Place this dilemma on this mission. At the start of each of your turns, if you command no personnel or ships at this mission, remove this dilemma from the game. When personnel begin a mission attempt at this mission, randomly select a personnel to be returned to its owner's hand.

name: Inhumane Interrogation
text: Randomly select a personnel to be killed. You may destroy an event in your core to prevent this.

name: Hypospray
text: When your personnel present is about to be killed by a dilemma, you may stop that personnel and your Medical personnel present to prevent that. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Product Placement
text: Discard an equipment, event, or interrupt from hand to spend two additional counters this turn. Destroy this event.

name: Slightly Awkward
text: Plays in your core. When a personnel that the player on your right commands begins a mission attempt, you may discard an equipment, event, or interrupt from hand to choose one: draw an extra dilemma; or, spend one extra in total cost on dilemmas.

name: Tolian Soran Renegade Scientist *VP
skills: Astrometrics Engineer 2 Physics Programming Transporters 2 Treachery
text: When this personnel uses a skill, randomly stop one of your personnel present.

name: Timescape *VP
text: Place this dilemma on this mission. You cannot begin a mission attempt at this mission. At the end of this turn, this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Urgency *VP
text: Place this dilemma on this mission. Each personnel may use no more than one skill during each dilemma he or she faces. Each personnel may use no more than one skill to meet a mission's requirements. At the end of this turn, this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Deploy the Fleet *VP
text: Score 5 points for each of your staffed ships that has its Commander aboard at an opponent's non-headquarters mission. Destroy this event.

name: Desperate Sacrifice *VP
text: Plays in your core. Order - If you command four events, destroy this event to make each player choose two events he or she commands, then destroy each other event he or she commands.

name: How Would You Like a Trip to Romulus? *VP
text: Choose one: download a Commander that corresponds with your ship; or download a ship that corresponds with your Commander. Destroy this event.

name: You've Always Been My Favorite *VP
text: To play this event, you must command three [Bor] personnel. Lose 5 points to play in your core. When you play this event, download up to five cards, then place them on this event. You may spend 1 counter to take a card on this event into your hand. When there are no cards on this event, destroy it.

name: Allies on the Inside *VP
text: Order - Download a Dissident personnel, then discard cards from hand equal to that personnel's cost. Remove this interrupt from the game.

name: Leeta Rebel Supporter *VP
text: When you play this personnel, discard a card from hand. While you have more than ten cards in your discard pile, each of your Dissident personnel present is attributes +1.

name: Jake Sisko Reporter Behind the Lines *VP
text: When you play this personnel, discard a card from hand. When you play another Dissident personnel, you may make each player discard the top card of his or her deck.

name: Healing Hand
text: Choose a Medical personnel to be stopped. Unless the personnel stopped by this dilemma has 2 Medical, this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Sent Back
text: To play this event, you must discard two [Rom] cards from hand. Choose an opponent and name a personnel or event. That opponent places each card he or she commands with that card title on the bottom of its owner's deck and then draws two cards. Destroy this event.

name: Dukat Cardassian Representative
text: When you play this personnel, you may choose one: download {Ruling Council} or download a [Dom] card. Order - Discard three non-personnel cards (or two [TN] cards) from hand to destroy an event.

name: Morgan Bateson Confident Commander
text: While no player commands a Temporal event, this personnel is attributes +1.

name: Enterprise Damaged Starship
text: While this ship is at a Region: Delphic Expanse mission, you may play [SF] personnel and equipment aboard this ship. While you command a completed Region: Delphic Expanse mission and this ship is at a Region: Delphic Expanse mission, you may play [NA] personnel aboard this ship.

name: Enterprise Damaged Starship *VP
text: While this ship is at a Region: Delphic Expanse mission, you may play [SF] personnel and equipment aboard this ship. While you command a completed Region: Delphic Expanse mission and this ship is at a Region: Delphic Expanse mission, you may play [NA] personnel aboard this ship.

name: Infinite Diversity
text: Your opponent discards two cards from hand to name a skill (except Acquisition, Intelligence, Law, or Telepathy). Unless you have Anthropology and that skill or Science and that skill, all your personnel are stopped.

name: Allegiance
text: To play this event, you must command six [Fed][Maq] personnel. Plays in your core. At the end of each of your turns, if an opponent has no cards in hand, you may choose one: Download a [Maq] Leadership personnel, or score 5 points, or draw six cards and then place three cards from hand on the bottom of your deck.

name: Kira Nerys Liberator
text: When a [Baj] personnel present is killed by a dilemma, you may take a different Bajoran Resistance personnel from your discard pile and place him or her present with this personnel. That personnel joins this mission attempt.

name: This Side of Paradise
text: Plays in your core. When your personnel is about to be killed by a dilemma, you may place him or her on this event instead.

name: Legacy
text: You and your opponent each reveal the top three dilemmas of your dilemma piles. Unless you revealed an equal or greater number of dilemmas that require a skill than your opponent, all of your personnel are stopped.

name: Berlinghoff Rasmussen Temporal "Historian"
text: Order - Stop this personnel to take command of an equipment present that you do not own. Order - If this personnel is on an opponent's planet mission, stop him to give command of an equipment present you command but do not own to that opponent to score 5 points.

name: Forced Into Labor
text: Unless you have Geology, Leadership, and {Trellium-D} or 2 Security and Strength>32, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Trellium-D
text: When you play this equipment, it is cost -1 for each Region: Delphic Expanse mission you command. Plays aboard your ship. When you play this equipment, discard a non-personnel card from hand to draw two cards.

name: Spatial Reconfiguration
text: Plays on your non-headquarters mission. This mission gains Region: Delphic Expanse and can be attempted by your [SF] personnel. When a card an opponent owns causes you to lose command of this event, return it to its owner's hand.

name: Travis Mayweather Damaged Navigator
text: While this personnel is at a Region: Delphic Expanse mission, if there is a [SF] ship at this mission with unused Range>5, this personnel is attributes +1 and gains Geology, Honor, and Security.

name: Investigate Refinery
skills: 2 Physics, Security, Treachery, and Strength>31 or Engineer, Leadership, Science, and Cunning>34

name: Holding Cell
text: To play this event, you must command six [DS9] personnel. Plays in your core. When you play this event, name a personnel, then each player places each copy of that personnel they command on this event (those personnel cannot use abilities). When an opponent is about to play an interrupt, prevent that interrupt and place it on this event.

name: Elim Garak Federation Agent
text: Your Intelligence personnel present are each attributes +1.

name: Phlox Damaged Doctor
text: When a personnel present is about to be killed by a dilemma, if this personnel is at a Region: Delphic Expanse mission, you may return that personnel to his or her owner's hand.

name: Diversionary Tactics
text: To play this interrupt, discard two [Fed] cards from hand. When an opponent plays an interrupt, if one of his or her personnel is facing a dilemma you own, prevent that interrupt and place it in its owner's discard pile. Order - Take a [Fed] card from your discard pile and place it on top of its owner's deck.

name: Opportunity Seized
text: To play this interrupt, discard a card from beneath your {Ferenginar}. When an opponent plays an interrupt, you may destroy your Rule to prevent that interrupt and place it in its owner's discard pile. Place this interrupt beneath your {Ferenginar}. Order - Your [Fer] ship is Range +4 until the end of the turn.

name: Ruling Council
text: To play this interrupt, you must command {Mouth of the Wormhole} and three non-Dissident [TN] personnel. Order - Unstop each of your stopped [TN] personnel.

name: Vorta Discipline
text: When your Founder or Vorta is about to be stopped, stop your Jem'Hadar present with him or her to prevent that. Order - Kill your Jem'Hadar present with a Treachery Vorta to destroy an event that has a cost equal to or less than that Jem'Hadar's cost.

name: Ibboko Kreetassan Chancellor
text: When you play this personnel, you may download a Ritual event or a Kreetassan personnel. When a Ritual event you own is destroyed, you may discard a card from hand to place that Ritual event in your core.

name: Code Forty-Seven
text: Choose one or more [Cmd] personnel to be stopped. Unless the total cost of personnel stopped by this dilemma is 4 or more, this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Gravitational Anomaly
text: Unless you have Navigation, Science, and {Trellium-D} or Geology, Physics, and Cunning>32, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Honorable Pursuit
text: Choose an Honor personnel to be stopped. Unless the personnel stopped by this dilemma has 2 Honor, this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Pitching In
text: If you have four or more personnel who have a cost of 2 or less attempting this mission, this dilemma is cost -3. Choose a Leadership or Security personnel to be stopped. Then choose an Engineer or Programming personnel to be stopped.

name: Unfair Comparison
text: You and your opponent each reveal the top three dilemmas of your dilemma piles. Unless you revealed dilemmas that have an equal or greater total cost than your opponent, randomly select three personnel to be stopped.

name: Alvera Tree Ritual
text: Plays in your core. When a personnel begins a mission attempt, you may have each player shuffle his or her dilemma pile.

name: Klingon Tea Ceremony
text: Plays in your core. When an opponent downloads a card, if he or she has already downloaded a card this turn, that opponent must place it on top of his or her deck instead of in his or her hand.

name: Exchange Program
text: To play this interrupt, you must command two [Kli] ships. When an opponent plays an interrupt, download an interrupt. Order - Place one of your [Kli] personnel at an opponent's headquarters mission (he or she now commands that personnel) to take a personnel at that headquarters mission that has a cost equal to or less than that [Kli] personnel and place him or her at your {Qo'noS} (you now command that personnel).

name: Hidden Resource
text: When an opponent plays a ship, discard a [Baj] card from hand to download a [Baj] ship. Order - Each of your [Baj] ships is Range +5 until the end of this turn.

name: Lustful Distraction
text: To play this interrupt, stop two of your [AU][SF] personnel. While you have no cards in hand, you may play this interrupt from on your {Watch Dog}. When an interrupt is played, prevent that interrupt and place it in its owner's discard pile. Order - Choose an event. The owner of that event shuffles it into his or her deck.

name: Secret Agenda
text: When your [Rom] Leadership personnel is facing a dilemma, name a skill that none of your personnel facing that dilemma has. That [Rom] Leadership personnel gains that skill until the end of that dilemma. Order - Examine an opponent's hand. For each [Rom] Leadership personnel you command, choose an interrupt revealed. That opponent discards each one.

name: Superior Position
text: To play this interrupt, you must have more points or command more ships than one of your opponents. When your [Car] personnel is about to be killed by a dilemma, stop that personnel instead. Order - Discard the top card of your deck to take a [Car] card from your discard pile and place it on top of its owner's deck.

name: Unrelenting
text: To play this interrupt, stop a personnel you command but do not own aboard your [Bor] ship. When an opponent plays an interrupt, you may give command and place a personnel he or she owns but that you command at his or her headquarters mission to prevent that interrupt and place it in its owner's discard pile. Order - Take command of an opponent's personnel present with a personnel that he or she owns but that you command.

name: Investigate Anachronism
skills: Diplomacy, Leadership, 2 Security, and Strength>30 or 2 Anthropology, Biology, Honor, and Cunning>30

name: Benjamin Sisko Man of Two Worlds
text: When you play this personnel, you may download a Prophet card and/or take each personnel you own that has been removed from the game and place them in your discard pile.

name: Odo Bajoran Representative
text: To play this personnel, you must command three non-Dissident [TN] personnel. You may play this personnel to {Mouth of the Wormhole} at cost +5 to do any or all of the following: score 5 points, download an equipment, download {Ruling Council}, download a [TN] card.

name: Amat'igan Founder Bodyguard
text: When your [Dom] personnel present is killed by a dilemma, you may take a Jem'Hadar from hand and place him present with this personnel. That personnel joins the mission attempt.

name: Weyoun Dominion Representative
text: When you play this personnel, you may choose one: download {Ruling Council} or download a [Car] card. Order - Place this personnel on the bottom of his owner's deck to name a personnel. Each opponent takes a personnel that he or she commands with that card title and places each on the bottom of his or her owner's deck.

name: Giotto Security Chief
text: You may play this personnel at cost +2 to prevent and overcome the first dilemma he faces this turn that has a cost of 1 or more and does not require a skill.

name: Farek Distrusting Doctor
text: When this personnel or a Ferengi personnel present is about to be killed by a dilemma, you may remove a non-Ferengi personnel beneath your {Ferenginar} from the game to prevent that.

name: Amaros Freedom Fighter
text: When you play this personnel, you may discard any number of [Maq] cards from hand to download an equal number of cards. Those cards must have different titles and be events, interrupts or [Maq] ships.

name: Laavros Kreetassan Civil Servant
text: When a personnel present who has a cost of 4 or more is killed by a dilemma, you may stop this personnel to download a personnel of the same affiliation as that killed personnel and place him or her with this personnel. That personnel joins the mission attempt.

name: Punull
text: When you play this personnel you may download up to four cards that have different titles. Then choose an opponent. He or she chooses two of those cards to be removed from the game.

name: Karina Hindering Analyst
text: When your [Rom] personnel present is about to be stopped by a dilemma, if you have more cards in hand than each opponent, discard an event from hand to prevent that.

name: Ruwon Hindering Analyst
text: When your [Rom] personnel present is about to be killed by a dilemma, if you have more cards in hand than each opponent, discard an event from hand to prevent that.

name: Charles Tucker III Damaged Engineer
text: Order - If this personnel is aboard your ship at a Region: Delphic Expanse mission, discard a card from hand to remove a Damage card from that ship. You may only do this once each turn.

name: Jonathan Archer Damaged Captain
skills: Astrometrics Diplomacy Engineer Leadership Officer Physics Security
text: While this personnel in facing a dilemma that does not require a skill at a Region: Delphic Expanse mission, you may exclude him and each of your [SF] personnel present from random selections.

name: Malcolm Reed Damaged Security Officer
text: When an engagement involving this personnel at a Region: Delphic Expanse mission begins, you may discard a random card from hand to prevent that engagement and stop each personnel and ship involved.

name: T'Pol Damaged Science Officer
skills: Archaeology Engineer Geology Law Physics Programming Science Transporters
text: While this personnel is at a Region: Delphic Expanse mission, ignore her next ability. When this personnel is about to face the third dilemma of a mission attempt, stop her.

name: U.S.S. Bozeman Well-Preserved Antique
text: While a player commands a Temporal event, this ship is Range -3. Order - If this ship is at a non-headquarters mission, stop six personnel aboard to destroy a Temporal event.

name: Kilhra Hidden Threat
text: When you lose command of one of your events, you may take a non-dilemma card that you own that was on that event into hand.

name: Sphere 634 *VP
text: When this ship is about to move between an [AQ] mission and a [DQ] mission, do not add 2 to the span total of those missions.

name: Secret Identity *VP
text: Your opponent chooses a personnel. You may replace him or her with any one personnel of the same affiliation from your deck. Place the personnel your opponent chose in his or her owner's discard pile. Shuffle and replace your deck.

name: Formal Hearing *VP
text: For each event your opponent commands in his or her core, this dilemma is cost -1. Unless you have Diplomacy, Intelligence, 2 Programming and Cunning>38 or 2 Honor, Law, and 2 Officer, randomly select three personnel to be stopped.

name: Overwhelmed *VP
text: Place this dilemma on this mission. When a personnel facing a dilemma at this mission uses his or her skills, he or she is stopped. At the end of this turn, return this dilemma to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Grav-Plating Trap *VP
text: When an event or interrupt is played, destroy one of your non-Hand Weapon equipment to prevent that event or interrupt and place it in its owner's discard pile. Order - Destroy one of your non-Hand Weapon equipment to destroy an event.

name: Enabran Tain "Retired" Spymaster *VP
text: When you play this personnel, if each of your non-headquarters missions requires Intelligence, you may draw up to seven cards, then discard two cards from hand.

name: Gelnon Aloof Tactician *VP
text: When you play this personnel, if each of your non-headquarters missions is an [AQ] mission, you may download a Jem'Hadar and place it aboard your [Dom] ship.

name: Jean-Luc Picard Vintner *VP
text: When you play this personnel, if each of your non-headquarters missions requires Biology, you may download up to three [TNG] personnel.

name: Alexander Rozhenko K'mtar *VP
text: When you play this personnel, if each of your non-headquarters missions requires Diplomacy, you may download up to two events, then play each of them at cost -3.

name: U.S.S. Defiant Repurposed Warship *VP
text: When you play this ship, if each of your non-headquarters missions is a [GQ] mission, you may spend 5 additional counters this turn.

name: Coolant Leak
text: Unless you have Engineer or a personnel who has a cost of 4 or more, all your personnel are stopped. If you have two or more personnel who have Engineer or cost 1 or less, randomly select all but one of those personnel to be stopped.

name: Information Extraction
text: Your personnel cannot gain skills while facing this dilemma. Unless you have Intelligence, Officer, and Programming or Exobiology, Medical, and Treachery, randomly select a personnel to be stopped and if this dilemma's owner chooses to lose 5 points, then add 10 to each attribute requirement of this mission until the end of this mission attempt.

name: I Stand With My Shipmates
text: Plays in your core. When you are about to lose 5 points to pay the cost of a card you own, if you have 5 points, you may destroy this card instead to pay that cost.

name: Quinn
text: Order - Lose 5 points to make each player choose two events in play. All other events are destroyed.

name: Garth of Izar Criminally Insane
text: You may play this personnel at cost +5 to reveal the top card of an opponent's deck. If it is a personnel that opponent does not command, it is placed in your brig (that opponent now commands him or her) and this personnel gains each of that personnel's skills until the end of this turn.

name: Richard Galen Legendary Archaeologist
text: When you play this personnel, you may download an Artifact. While this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may lose 5 points to have a personnel present gain all skills that this mission has in its requirements until the end of this mission attempt.

name: DaiMon Solok Cargo Runner
skills: Acquisition Anthropology Engineer Navigation Officer Transporters
text: To play this personnel, place the top card of your dilemma pile underneath a non-headquarters mission of the opponent to your right's choice. When you play this personnel, if you command three [Fer] personnel, score 5 points.

name: Deanna Troi Durango
text: When an opponent plays a Security personnel or places a Security personnel from hand on a headquarters mission, you may discard two cards from hand to stop that personnel.

name: Alien Encounter
text: Unless you have Anthropology, Diplomacy, Exobiology, Leadership, and Integrity>34, or command one or less headquarters missions, choose five personnel to be stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Broken Link
text: Your personnel cannot gain skills while facing this dilemma. Unless you have Anthropology, Biology, and Law or Diplomacy, Leadership, and Security, randomly select a personnel to be stopped and if this dilemma's owner discards a Capture card or a Punishment card from hand, then that personnel is placed in your opponent's brig instead.

name: Desperation
text: Unless you have 3 Security or Leadership, Treachery, and Strength>28, randomly select a personnel and choose a personnel to be stopped for each different Bajoran Resistance personnel your opponent commands.

name: Family
text: Randomly select a personnel to be stopped. Unless you reveal an Honor personnel from your hand or reveal a Treachery personnel from your hand, place that personnel on the bottom of his or her owner's deck instead.

name: Inequitable Exchange
text: If your opponent has a captive in his or her brig, this dilemma is cost -3. Take a personnel you own from an opponent's brig (he or she joins this mission attempt). Then your opponent chooses a different personnel to be placed in his or her brig.

name: Just Following Orders
text: Your personnel cannot gain skills while facing this dilemma. Unless you have Astrometrics, Intelligence, and Treachery or Geology, Honor, and Navigation, randomly select a personnel to be stopped and if this dilemma's owner discards an event from hand, then he or she may destroy an event.

name: One Step Ahead
text: Unless you have 2 Programming and 2 Transporters or two Hand Weapons, all your personnel are stopped. When you meet the requirements of this dilemma, you may stop a Security personnel to score 5 points.

name: The Launching
text: Unless you have 2 Astrometrics and 2 Physics or two non-Hand Weapon equipment, all your personnel are stopped. When you meet the requirements of this dilemma, you may stop an Engineer personnel to score 5 points.

name: Trilithium Heist
text: Your personnel cannot gain skills while facing this dilemma. Unless you have Acquisition, Engineer, and Transporters or Medical, Physics, and Science, randomly select a personnel to be stopped and if this dilemma's owner discards a Crime card from hand, then he or she scores 5 points.

name: Earring of Li Nalas
text: When your Bajoran Resistance personnel present is about to be stopped by a dilemma, you may destroy your Assault event or your Hand Weapon he or she is equipped with to prevent that. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Resistance Rifle
text: While in combat, each of your Bajoran Resistance personnel present is Strength +1. While your Bajoran Resistance personnel present is facing a dilemma, you may add that personnel's Strength to his or her Cunning or Integrity until the end of that dilemma. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Bajoran Resistance Cell
text: To play this event, you must command three Bajoran Resistance personnel. Choose one: download an Assault event; download a Hand Weapon; or download a Bajoran Resistance personnel and place him or her in your discard pile. Destroy this event.

name: Ferengi Tradition
text: To play this event, you must command six [Fer] personnel. Lose 10 points to score 20 points. Remove this event from the game.

name: Isabella
text: Plays in your core. While a personnel is facing a Persistent dilemma, that personnel cannot use his or her abilities.

name: Peak Performance
text: Plays in your core. When you play this event, name a unique personnel. While you have 30 or more points, your personnel with that title is attributes +1. While you have 60 or more points, your personnel with that title cannot be stopped by dilemmas.

name: Promenade School
text: Stop four of your [Fed][DS9] personnel of four different species to score 5 points. Remove this event from the game.

name: Recruitment Tactics
text: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin combat involving your Bajoran Resistance personnel. If you win, randomly select an opponent's personnel involved to be killed and you may take a Bajoran Resistance personnel from your discard pile and place him or her on your {Bajor}.

name: Event Horizon
text: When an opponent's personnel complete a mission, if you command a completed mission, lose 5 points to return each Persistent dilemma beneath that opponent's mission to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Flaw in the Plan
text: When an opponent plays a personnel or places a personnel from hand on a headquarters mission, discard three unique personnel from hand to kill that personnel. Order - Kill four personnel you own.

name: Hate
text: When an opponent's personnel gains a skill as a result of paying a cost, if you command a completed mission, lose 5 points to remove that personnel from the game.

name: My Patience Has Limits
text: To play this interrupt, you must command three [Rom] personnel. Order - Lose 5 points to name a dilemma. Choose an opponent to reveal all copies of that dilemma from his or her dilemma pile. You may remove a copy of that dilemma from the game (or lose 5 points to remove each copy of that dilemma from the game). That opponent shuffles and replaces his or her dilemma pile.

name: Surprise Audit
text: When your personnel aboard a ship is facing a dilemma, lose 5 points to take a [Fer] personnel from beneath your {Ferenginar} and place him or her aboard that ship. That personnel joins the mission attempt.

name: Kaitaama Precious Cargo
text: When this personnel is about to be placed in a brig, return her to her owner's hand. When this personnel is killed by a dilemma, score 5 points. When this personnel is stopped by a dilemma, draw a card.

name: Kaitaama Precious Cargo *VP
text: When this personnel is about to be placed in a brig, return her to her owner's hand. When this personnel is killed by a dilemma, score 5 points. When this personnel is stopped by a dilemma, draw a card.

affiliation: Any affiliation may attempt this mission.
name: Assess Contamination
text: Prevent and overcome the first dilemma your personnel face here each turn that has a cost of 1 or more and does not require a skill.

name: Falsify Distress Signal
text: When you complete this mission, if you have six or more cards beneath your {Ferenginar}, you may lose 5 points to take an additional turn after this one.

name: Mine Vendarite
text: When you complete this mission, if you command another completed Region: Ligos System mission or have a personnel in your brig, score 5 points and restore the Range of each ship you command.

name: Off-World Raid
skills: Geology, Leadership, Security, and (Integrity>38 or Strength>40)
text: When your personnel complete this mission, each player may shuffle each Assault event and each Hand Weapon in his or her discard pile into its owner's deck.

name: Furel Resistance Scout
text: Order - Lose 5 points to unstop up to two stopped Bajoran Resistance personnel present. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Halb Daier Resistance Contact
text: When you play this personnel, you may download {No Love For the Spoon Heads}.

name: Kira Nerys Ih'valla
text: When you begin a mission attempt involving this personnel, you may lose 5 points to take up to two [Baj] cards from your discard pile into hand.

name: Opaka Collaborator
text: When you play this personnel, if you command {Bajor} and no other headquarters mission, you may score 5 points. Order - Lose 5 points to take a Bajoran Resistance personnel from your discard pile and place him or her on your Bajor. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Orta Resistance Leader
text: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may lose 5 points to make each Bajoran Resistance personnel present attributes +1 until the end of this turn. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Surmak Ren Resistance Doctor
text: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, if he is present with two Bajoran Resistance personnel, you may lose 5 points to download an interrupt. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Broca "Leader" of the Cardassian Union
text: When you play this personnel, if you command three [Car] personnel, you may discard the top six cards of your deck to score 5 points.

name: Eris Harbinger of the Dominion
text: When you play this personnel, if you command a Founder and a Vorta, you may score 5 points. When you begin combat involving this personnel, randomly select an opponent's personnel present to be excluded from that combat.

name: Charles Whatley Professional Admiral
text: When you play this personnel, you may lose 5 points to download up to two [E] personnel, then place them on your {Mouth of the Wormhole}.

name: Jaresh-Inyo Federation President
text: When you play this personnel, you may lose 5 points to download up to three [DS9] personnel, then place them on your [HQ] {Earth} where each personnel could be played.

name: Luther Sloan Man of Action
text: Order - Remove your event from the game and return this personnel to his owner's hand to destroy an opponent's event.

name: Croden Dissembler
text: When you play this personnel, choose an opponent to choose one: the next card you play this turn is cost -4 or you score 5 points.

name: Emck Export Controller
skills: Acquisition Biology Leadership Medical Navigation Physics Treachery
text: When you are about to play this personnel, you may lose 5 points to do any or all of the following: play him at cost -3, play him aboard your [NA] ship, download a [NA] personnel.

name: Donatra Honorable Commander
skills: Diplomacy Honor Leadership Navigation Officer Physics
text: While this personnel is facing a dilemma that has a cost of 1 or more and does not require a skill, you may remove this personnel from the game to prevent and overcome that dilemma.

name: Te'nari Resistance Flagship
text: While you command three Bajoran Resistance personnel aboard this ship, it is attributes +2. You may pay the cost of losing 5 points to use an ability on one of your Bajoran Resistance personnel at this mission by destroying your Hand Weapon he or she is equipped with or your Assault event that has a cost of 1 or more.

name: U.S.S. Enterprise-D Diplomatic Envoy
text: When you complete this mission, if this ship is staffed, score 5 points. When you complete this mission, if this ship's Commander is aboard, each player scores 5 points.

name: Eleventh Gradient Export Vessel
text: When you are about to play this ship, you may lose 5 points to play this ship at cost -7. At the start of each of your turns, you may return your event on this mission to its owner's hand.

name: U.S.S. Enterprise-J *VP
text: Plays in your core. Each of your personnel at a mission that is worth 40 or more points is attributes +1.

name: Surprise Party
text: Plays in your core. You may spend an additional counter each turn.

name: Phoenix Risen From the Ashes *VP
text: While this ship is at a non-headquarters mission and does not have a Damage marker on it, each of your opponents needs an additional 10 points to win the game.

name: Gomtuu Shock Wave *VP
text: Unless you have 2 Diplomacy and Integrity>32 or Telepathy and Integrity>35, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma is placed on your ship. Damage - This ship is attributes -2.

name: Where No One Has Gone Before *VP
text: Unless you have Astrometrics, Navigation, Physics, and Cunning>34 or Exobiology, Leadership, Medical, and Integrity>32, place this dilemma in your core and place your ship on this dilemma. At the end of your next turn, remove this dilemma from the game and place the ship at your headquarters mission.

name: Exceed Engine Output *VP
text: Plays in your core. Order - Move your ship with your Engineer aboard to a space mission, then place this event on that ship. Damage - This ship is Weapons -2 and Shields -2.

name: Talnot *VP
text: While you command an event in your core and have a copy of that same event in your discard pile, your opponent cannot destroy that event.

name: I.K.S. Ning'tao *VP
text: When you win an engagement involving this ship, you may lose 5 points to download a Damage card and place it on an opponent's ship at this mission.

name: Defiant Mirror Warship *VP
text: To play this ship, you must command three [AU] personnel. When you play this ship, you may discard any number of cards from hand. This ship is cost -1 for each card discarded this way.

name: Columbia The Second Warp Five Ship *VP
text: While the first mission you completed this game was a space mission, this ship is attributes +1. While a personnel aboard this ship is facing a dilemma, you may discard a card from hand to have that personnel gain Astrometrics or Science until the end of the mission attempt.

name: Locutus' Borg Cube *VP
text: Order - If this ship is staffed, return your {Drone} aboard it to his or her owner's hand to download a Maneuver card. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Arrogance
text: Reveal the top card of your deck. Unless it has a cost of 4 or more, randomly select a personnel to be stopped.

name: Breached
text: Unless you have Navigation, Security, Transporters, and Strength>30 or 2 Physics, Treachery, and Cunning>30, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma is placed on your ship. Damage - Opponents' personnel may beam between this ship and his or her ship at this mission.

name: Duty Schedule
text: Your opponent chooses a number of personnel equal to the number of staffing requirement icons on this ship. Choose one of those personnel to be stopped.

name: Galileo Grounded
text: Unless you have Medical, Security, and Transporters or a staffed ship at this mission, all your personnel are stopped.

name: Greater Needs
text: Unless you have Anthropology, Diplomacy, Exobiology, and Integrity>30 or Leadership, Transporters, Treachery, and Strength>30, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma is placed on your ship at this mission. Damage - Your personnel cannot begin a mission attempt at this mission.

name: Insurrection
text: This dilemma is cost +1. Place this dilemma on this mission (limit one per mission). If this mission is worth 30 or more points, add 10 to each printed attribute requirement<32 needed to complete this mission. When this mission is completed, place this dilemma beneath your incomplete non-headquarters mission.

name: Programmed Compulsion
text: Unless you have 2 Navigation and Programming or Engineer and Cunning>40, your opponent may place this dilemma on one of your missions. All your personnel are attributes -1. At the end of each of your turns, if you have a staffed ship at this mission, you may remove this dilemma from the game.

name: Rude Awakening
text: Choose the corresponding Commander of this ship or a personnel who has [Cmd] and Officer to be stopped. If you cannot, all your personnel are stopped.

name: Rush Job
text: Choose a personnel to be stopped. Unless this ship has four or more staffing requirement icons, choose a personnel to be stopped. Unless this ship has a [Cmd] icon in its staffing requirements, your opponent chooses a personnel to be stopped.

name: Sudden Stealth
text: Unless you have Engineer, Officer, and Programming or a Cloaking Device ship at this mission, all your personnel are stopped.

name: The Oracle's Punishment
text: Your opponent chooses two personnel to be stopped. When this dilemma is overcome, if it was prevented, your opponent may choose one of your personnel involved in the mission attempt to be killed.

name: Stolen Cloaking Device
text: To play this equipment, you must command an Engineer personnel. When you play this equipment, you may download {Engage Cloak}. While this equipment is aboard your staffed ship, this ship gains Cloaking Device.

name: Christening
text: Reveal your hand. If you do not command a ship and you do not reveal a ship from hand, this event is cost -3. Download a ship. Destroy this event.

name: Executive Commission
text: To play this event, you must command a ship at a non-headquarters mission with its corresponding Commander aboard. Take up to four cards that are personnel or ships from your discard pile and place them on the bottom of your deck. Remove this event from the game.

name: Extreme Measures
text: Destroy a non-[Voy] ship you own to spend a number of additional counters equal to the cost of that ship. Remove this event from the game.

name: Rule of Acquisition #34
text: To play this event, you must command three [Fer] personnel. Plays in your core. When an engagement begins, you may place a card from hand beneath your {Ferenginar}. When you win an engagement, you may place this card beneath your Ferenginar.

name: Special Modifications
text: Plays in your core. Add [Cmd] to the staffing requirements of each of your ships. Each of your staffed ships is attributes +1.

name: The Hand of Apollo
text: Plays in your core. When personnel that the player on your right commands begin a mission attempt, unless he or she has a ship at that mission with four or more staffing requirement icons, you may destroy this event to draw three extra dilemmas and spend three extra in total cost on dilemmas.

name: Cloak and Dagger
text: When an opponent's personnel begins a mission attempt, take your staffed Cloaking Device ship from an opponent's mission and place it at that mission. Remove this interrupt from the game.

name: Assimilate Starship
skills: Engineer, Programming, and Cunning>42 or Security, Transporters, and Strength>40
text: When you complete this mission, you may choose an opponent, place a ship you do not command from his or her discard pile at this mission, and take command of that ship. (It becomes [Bor].)

affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
name: Evaluate Soliton Wave
text: While your personnel are attempting this mission aboard a ship with a printed attribute>8, this mission is worth 10 more points.

name: Repair Null Space Catapult
skills: Astrometrics, Engineer, Physics, Cunning>34, and (Diplomacy or Treachery)
text: When your personnel complete this mission, you may take an event from your discard pile into hand and/or place your staffed ship here at a different mission.

name: Kasidy Yates Freighter Captain
text: While this personnel is attempting a mission, if your staffed ship is at this mission, she is attributes +2 and gains Honor and Navigation.

name: Dukat Ambitious Commander
skills: Acquisition Leadership Navigation Officer Programming Treachery
text: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may discard a ship from hand to make him gain a skill from your personnel present until the end of that mission attempt.

name: Gelnon Accurate Estimator
text: When you play a unique [Dom] personnel, if you have played no other personnel this turn, each player may discard a card from hand to download an Infiltrator or an Infiltration card.

keywords: Commander: I.K.S. Vorn. High Council Member.
name: Duras Devious Challenger
text: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, if your staffed ship is at this mission, you may meet Diplomacy and Honor requirements of that dilemma using Treachery instead.

name: Neelix Valued Guide
skills: Acquisition Anthropology Diplomacy Exobiology Honor Navigation
text: This personnel is attributes +1 for each of your completed space missions.

name: Xhosa Sponsored Transport
text: While this ship is about to move between a Region: Bajor System mission and a non-Region: Bajor System mission, subtract 1 from the Range required. At the start of each of your turns, if this ship is staffed at a non-headquarters mission, you may place an equipment or a personnel from your discard pile on top of your deck.

name: Groumall Inauspicious Command
text: While you have a ship in your discard pile, this ship is attributes +2. Order - Discard up to three cards from hand to take an equal number of [Car] ships from your discard pile into hand. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Ammut'alar Unexpected Threat
text: When a card your opponent owns is about to destroy your Infiltration event, if this ship is staffed at a non-headquarters mission, you may discard an Infiltration card or an Infiltrator from hand to prevent that.

name: I.K.S. Vorn Ship of Traitors
text: While your three [Kli] Treachery personnel are aboard, this ship is attributes +2. While your three [Kli] Treachery personnel are aboard, each of your Treachery personnel at this mission is attributes +1.

name: Kira Nerys Ambitious Ally
skills: Diplomacy Honor Law Programming Security Transporters
text: You may play this personnel aboard your [Car] ship. When you play this personnel, you may download a ship.

name: Damar Ambitious Glinn
text: Order - Discard a [Car] ship from hand to draw three cards. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Tora Ziyal Ambitious Daughter
text: When this personnel is about to be stopped by a dilemma, you may discard a ship from hand to prevent that.

name: Tugat
text: While this personnel is attempting a mission, if you discard a ship from hand, you may reveal him to make him attributes +1 until the end of the turn (limit +4).

name: Benjamin Maxwell Misguided Maverick
text: While your staffed [Fed] ship is at this mission, you may exclude this personnel from random selections.

name: John Harriman Captain of the Enterprise
text: When this personnel is facing a dilemma, if your staffed ship is at this mission, you may discard a random card from hand to make this personnel gain a skill from a [TOS] personnel aboard that ship until the end of that mission attempt.

name: Ro Laren Apologetic Defector
text: When you complete a Region: Demilitarized Zone mission involving this personnel, each player may take up to two events with different card titles from his or her discard pile into his or her hand.

name: Ronald Tracey Delusional Captain
text: You may play this personnel at cost +1 to download a non-Artifact equipment.

name: Tom Paris Competitive Pilot
skills: Astrometrics Biology Engineer Medical 2 Navigation Officer
text: When you play this personnel, if you command four space missions, he is cost -3.

name: Bractor Suspicious Leader
text: While this personnel is aboard a [Fer] ship, if you command three Rule events, that ship is attributes +2.

name: Sybok Fanatical Missionary
skills: Anthropology Astrometrics Diplomacy Engineer Leadership Treachery
text: When a dilemma that this personnel is facing is about to be returned to its owner's dilemma pile, you may remove that dilemma from the game. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Sela Supervising Operative
text: When you play this personnel, you may download up to two cards. Those cards must be {Capture cards}, {Punishment cards}, or {The Perfect Tool}.

name: Jonathan Archer Defiant Commander
text: While you have no cards in hand, each [AU][SF] personnel present is Cunning +1 (and Integrity +1 if they are aboard an [AU][SF] ship).

name: Kaza'kime Effective Demonstration
text: To staff this ship, you must have a [Dom] personnel who costs 3 or more aboard. When this ship is destroyed, you may download a card. Order - If this ship is staffed, destroy it to download a Damage card, then place it on an opponent's ship at this mission.

name: Cosette Reliable Raider
text: This ship is attributes +1 for each of your Region: Demilitarized Zone missions (limit +3). Order - Reveal the top card of an opponent's deck. If it is a personnel, name an event. Cards that opponent owns may not prevent or destroy that event you own until the start of your next Execute Orders segment. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Delta Flyer Rebuilt "Hot Rod"
text: To play this ship, you must command four space missions. While you do not command a headquarters mission, you may play this ship at the same mission as your {U.S.S. Voyager}.

name: U.S.S. Enterprise-B Ill-Prepared Successor
text: When your personnel complete a mission, if this ship and your three [TOS] personnel aboard are at that mission, you may stop this ship to score 10 points. You may do this only once each turn.

name: U.S.S. Exeter Fleet's Finest
text: To play this ship, you must command four [TOS] personnel. You may play this ship at cost +2 to take up to two equipment cards from your discard pile into hand.

name: U.S.S. Phoenix Wayward Starship
text: When your personnel fail a mission attempt at a space mission, if this ship is at that mission, you may discard the top three cards of your deck to take a [TNG] card in your discard pile into hand. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Kreechta Prepared for War
text: When an engagement involving this ship ends, you may unstop each of your personnel and ships involved and restore all Range those ships have used this turn. You cannot begin any other engagements this turn.

name: U.S.S. Enterprise-A Chariot of "God"
text: When your personnel complete a mission, if this ship is staffed and at that mission, score 5 points. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Goraxus Lying in Wait
text: When you win an engagement involving this ship, randomly select an opponent's personnel involved to place in your brig. Order - Discard a Capture card from hand to begin an engagement involving this ship.

name: Starship Defiant Ripe for the Taking
text: To play this ship, you must command four [AU][SF] personnel. You may play this ship at cost +3 to destroy an event (or destroy two Maneuver events). Order - Place a card from hand on the bottom of your deck.

name: U.S.S. Enterprise-A Chariot of "God" *VP
text: When your personnel complete a mission, if this ship is staffed and at that mission, score 5 points. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Ezri Tigan Soldier of Fortune *VP
skills: Anthropology Geology Medical Navigation Security Transporters
text: When this personnel is stopped by a dilemma, choose an opponent and place this personnel at his or her headquarters mission. That opponent now commands this personnel.

name: The Pendari Champion Electrifying Favorite
text: Order - Examine the bottom card of any player's deck.

name: Infatuation
text: Randomly select a Security personnel to be stopped. If you still have nine personnel remaining, randomly select a Medical personnel to be stopped. If you still have ten personnel remaining, randomly select an Officer personnel to be stopped.

name: Last Stand
text: This dilemma is cost +3 for each headquarters mission your opponent commands. Your opponent may discard a Nucleogenic card from hand to make the next dilemma revealed during this mission attempt cost -3.

name: Optical Delusion
text: Unless you have Programming, 2 Security, and Transporters or a Hologram and Cunning>30, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma is placed in your core. At the start of each of your opponent's Play and Draw Cards segments, he or she may download {Under Siege} and play it at cost -2.

name: The Big Goodbye
text: Randomly select a personnel to be stopped. Unless you have Diplomacy, Engineer, and Medical or Anthropology, Leadership, and Strength>30, that personnel is killed and all your personnel are stopped.

name: The Next Phase
text: Your opponent chooses one of his or her personnel that has been removed from the game. Unless you have the skills on that personnel or one of your personnel has total attributes>that personnel's total attributes, all your personnel are stopped.

name: 1962 Roger Maris
text: Order - Give command of this event to an opponent to take command of an event with no cards on it in that opponent's core and place it in your core.

name: Base Commerce
text: To play this event, you must command two Acquisition personnel. Plays in your core. Order - Download a Commodity. You may do this only once each turn. Order - Destroy this event to take command of up to three non-Artifact Commodity events you own in opponent's cores.

name: Felicium
text: While you command but do not own this event, each player's Acquisition personnel are Strength +1.

name: Habak
text: To play this event, you must command a [Fed][Maq] Anthropology personnel. Plays on your Region: Demilitarized Zone mission (limit one per mission). This mission is worth 5 more points.

keywords: Replicate - Discard two cards from hand.
name: Holodeck Arch
text: Download a Hologram or a Holoprogram event. Destroy this event.

name: Hunters' Training Program
text: Plays in your core. While there are three or more cards on this event, each of your Holograms is attributes +1.

name: Not Easily Taken
text: To play this event, you must command a [Fed][Maq] Anthropology personnel. Plays in your core. While your [Maq] personnel is attempting a mission with an event on it, he or she is attributes +1. While an opponent's personnel is attempting a mission with an event on it, he or she is attributes -1.

name: Oo-mox
text: To play this event, you must command {Ferenginar}. Plays in your core. Each of your [Fer] personnel is attributes +1. At the end of your turn, place this event beneath your Ferenginar.

name: Outmaneuvered
text: To play this event, you must command three [Fed][Maq] personnel. Plays on an opponent's mission. Personnel may not gain skills here.

name: Photons Be Free
text: Plays in your core. While there are three or more cards on this event, the first Hologram personnel you play each turn is cost -2.

name: Tacking Into the Wind
text: This event is cost -2 for each completed mission the opponent on your left commands. Choose one: download a ship; destroy an event; or shuffle up to ten cards that are personnel or ships from your discard pile into your deck. Remove this event from the game.

name: Tulaberry Wine
text: While you command but do not own this event, each player's Acquisition personnel are Cunning +1.

affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
name: Evade Samaritan Snare
skills: 2 Engineer, Transporters, and (Honor and Integrity>30 or Treachery and Cunning>30)
text: When a player downloads an event or an interrupt, he or she must discard a card from hand for each headquarters mission he or she commands.

name: Fulfill Temporal Paradox
text: Each of your non-Human personnel at this mission is attributes +1.

name: Liberate Photonic Servants
skills: Anthropology, Officer, Security, Treachery, and (Cunning>35 or Strength>35)
text: When your Hologram uses a skill to complete this mission, you may download a Hologram or a Holoprogram.

name: Resolve Trade Dispute
skills: Acquisition, Diplomacy, Security, and (Honor and Cunning>34 or Treachery and Strength>34)
text: When you play a Commodity event, if you have completed this mission, that event is cost -1.

name: Settle Holographic Colony
skills: Engineer, Leadership, Programming, 3 Holograms, and Cunning>33
text: At the start of each of your turns, if you do not command a non-Hologram personnel, you may draw a card, then place a card from hand on your Holoprogram.

name: Paenol Resistance Soldier
text: When an opponent plays an interrupt, if you command {Bajor} and no other headquarters missions, you may lose 5 points to prevent that interrupt and place it in its owner's discard pile.

name: B'Elanna Torres Mostly Assimilated
text: While you command a [Bor] non-Dissident personnel, this personnel loses all of her skills and her next ability. When an event in your core is about to be destroyed by a card an opponent owns, you may stop this personnel to prevent that.

name: Eight of Eleven Laura
text: While you command a [Bor] non-Dissident personnel, this personnel loses all of her skills and her next ability. When your Dissident present is about to be killed by a dilemma at a [DQ] mission, you may discard a card from hand and stop that personnel to prevent that.

name: Five of Twelve Axum
skills: Anthropology Biology Engineer Leadership Navigation Programming
text: While you command a [Bor] non-Dissident personnel, this personnel loses all of his skills and his next ability. When you play this personnel, you may download a Dissident.

name: Kathryn Janeway Mostly Assimilated
text: While you command a [Bor] non-Dissident personnel, this personnel loses all of her skills and her next ability. When this personnel begins a mission attempt at a [DQ] mission, you may discard a card from hand to make her gain a skill of your choice until the end of the mission attempt.

name: Seven of Nine Annika
text: While you command a [Bor] non-Dissident personnel, this personnel loses all of her skills and her next ability. While this personnel is attempting a [DQ] mission, she and each Dissident personnel present are attributes +1.

name: Six of Ten Korok
skills: Astrometrics Honor 2 Leadership Navigation Officer Security
text: While you command a [Bor] non-Dissident personnel, this personnel loses all of his skills and his next ability. While this personnel is facing a dilemma that does not require a skill at a [DQ] mission, he cannot be killed.

name: Tuvok Mostly Assimilated
text: While you command a [Bor] non-Dissident personnel, this personnel loses all of his skills and his next ability. While this personnel is facing a dilemma at a [DQ] mission, he gains Law, Leadership, Officer and Security.

name: Hanok Trade Minister
skills: Acquisition Engineer Honor Leadership Physics Security
text: When this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may give command of your Commodity event to an opponent to make up to two of your personnel present lose all their skills (except Acquisition) until the end of that dilemma.

name: Inglatu Tulaberry Merchant
text: When this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may give command of your Commodity event to an opponent to make him gain a skill required by that dilemma until the end of that mission attempt.

name: Ornithar First Minister
text: When you play this personnel, you may give command of your Commodity event to an opponent. This personnel is attributes +1 for each different Commodity you own but an opponent commands (limit +3).

name: Zyree
text: When you play this personnel, for each Commodity event you own but an opponent commands, she is cost -1.

name: Anthwara Leader of the Tribal Council
text: When you are about to play an event on a mission, if you command {For the Cause}, you may play that event at cost -1 (or cost -2 if it is being played on a Region: Demilitarized Zone mission).

name: Boq'ta
text: While an opponent commands an Assault event, this personnel gains Diplomacy and Medical.

name: Guinan Battleship Bartender
text: When you play an [AU][TNG] card at this mission, you may stop this personnel to make that card cost -2.

name: Jones
text: When you play this personnel, you may lose 5 points to destroy an event in an opponent's core.

name: Kituhwa Tribal Historian
text: When you are about to lose command of an event on your mission, you may stop this personnel and discard a [Maq] card from hand to return that event to its owner's hand.

name: Uhura Experienced Technician
text: You may play this personnel at cost -2 to ignore her next ability. When you play this personnel, you may download an interrupt and/or a [TOS] Commander.

name: Wakasa Tribal Councilor
skills: Anthropology Diplomacy Engineer Geology Honor Programming
text: When this personnel is an eligible target for a random selection at a mission with an event on it, you may discard a random card from hand to exclude him and another [Maq] personnel present from that selection.

name: Worf Clandestine Staffer
text: You may play this personnel aboard your [TOS] ship. When an opponent plays an event that costs 2 or less, if this personnel is present with three [Pa] personnel, you may return this personnel to his owner's hand to prevent that event and place it in its owner's discard pile.

name: Jadzia Dax Tongo Player
text: While you command a [Fer][DS9] personnel, you may play this personnel at {Mouth of the Wormhole}. When you play this personnel, you may download {Tongo: Confront}.

name: Iden Lustrous Demagogue
skills: Anthropology Biology Exobiology Leadership Science Treachery
text: At the start of each of your turns, you may place a Hologram from hand on each Holoprogram event in your core, then draw an equal number of cards.

name: Kejal Radiant Mender
skills: Astrometrics Engineer Honor Programming Science Transporters
text: When a card an opponent owns is about to destroy your Holoprogram event, you may discard a Hologram from that event to prevent that.

name: The Doctor Brilliant Template
text: You may play Holograms from your Holoprogram events as if they were in your hand.

name: Weiss Glaring Tactician
text: When your Hologram present is about to be killed by a dilemma, you may place him or her on your Holoprogram event to prevent that. (You no longer command that Hologram.)

name: Markus Forbes Extraction Specialist
text: Order - If this personnel is at a non-headquarters mission, discard three [SF] cards (or two MACO personnel) from hand to place a captive you command present with this personnel.

name: Sara Fisher
text: This personnel is attributes +1 for each non-Human [SF] personnel you own that has been removed from the game (limit +4).

name: Sphere 117 Renegade Borg Sphere
text: While each of your missions is a [DQ] mission, each {Drone} you own gains Dissident and loses Drone.

name: Karemma Freighter
text: This ship is attributes +1 for each of these species you have aboard it: Dosi, Ferengi, Karemma. When your Acquisition personnel aboard is about to be killed by a dilemma, you may give command of your Commodity event to an opponent and stop that personnel to prevent that.

name: Subek'somac Alpha Attack Ship
text: When you play this ship, for each Alpha Jem'Hadar you command, this ship is cost -1. While your Alpha Jem'Hadar aboard this ship is facing a dilemma, you may meet that dilemma's Cunning or Integrity requirements using Strength instead.

name: Olarra Chariot of Light
text: While your [NA] Hologram with no staffing icons is aboard this ship, he or she gains [Stf]. When you are about to play a Hologram at your headquarters mission, you may play him or her aboard this ship instead.

name: Seven of Nine Annika *VP
text: While you command a [Bor] non-Dissident personnel, this personnel loses all of her skills and her next ability. While this personnel is attempting a [DQ] mission, she and each Dissident personnel present are attributes +1.

name: Back to Basics *VP
text: Your opponent counts each personnel and ship card in his or her discard pile and shuffles each of those cards into his or her deck. If fourteen or more cards were shuffled into his or her deck this way, all your personnel are stopped.

name: Swashbuckler at Heart *VP
text: Reveal your hand and place each interrupt revealed this way on top of your deck in any order. Your opponent draws up to two cards.

name: The Dreamer and the Dream *VP
text: Place this dilemma on this mission. At the end of this turn, this dilemma is overcome. If at that time this mission has not been completed, its owner discards his or her hand.

name: All-Out War *VP
text: Lose 5 points to play in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin combat or an engagement involving your [Kli] personnel. If you win, randomly kill three opponent's personnel involved.

name: Anything or Anyone *VP
text: To play this event, you must command three [Dom] personnel. Plays in your core. You may only execute one order using this event each turn. Order - Place an Infiltrator from hand on this event. (You now command that personnel.) Order - Place an Infiltrator from this event aboard an opponent's ship or on an opponent's planet mission.

name: Ohhhh! Nothing Happened! *VP
text: Plays in your core. When you play another Temporal card, you may destroy this event to name a dilemma. Choose an opponent to take a copy of that dilemma from his or her dilemma pile and remove it from the game. That opponent shuffles and replaces his or her dilemma pile face down.

name: Security Drills *VP
text: Plays in your core. While your personnel is facing a dilemma, you may place a [Fed] card from hand on this event to make that personnel gain a skill he or she already has until the end of that dilemma.

name: The Long Journey Home *VP
text: To play this event, you must command three [Voy] personnel. Plays on your {Caretaker's Array}. When you command four completed [DQ] space missions and have 100 or more points, you win the game.

name: Knowledge and Experience *VP
text: To play this interrupt, you must command three [Bor] personnel. When a personnel you command but do not own is facing a dilemma, lose 5 points to prevent and overcome that dilemma. Remove this interrupt from the game.

name: Luther Sloan Man of Action *VP
text: Order - Remove your event from the game and return this personnel to his owner's hand to destroy an opponent's event.

name: An Issue of Trust *VP
text: Unless you have Honor or Treachery, all your personnel are stopped. If you have two or more personnel who have Honor or Treachery, randomly select all but one of those personnel to be stopped.

name: Brothers
text: When your opponent reveals this dilemma, he or she may discard a personnel from hand to add 5 to each of this dilemma's attributes requirements (or add 10 if that personnel was an Android). Unless you have Engineer and Integrity>30 or Transporters and Cunning>30, all your personnel are stopped.

name: Conflict of Interests
text: Unless you have 3 Archaeology or Integrity>36, all your personnel are stopped. If four or more personnel of the same species are stopped by this dilemma, this dilemma's owner may discard a random card from hand to return this dilemma to his or her dilemma pile.

name: Eugenic Transformation
text: Unless you have 3 Exobiology or Cunning>36, all your personnel are stopped. If four or more personnel of the same species are stopped by this dilemma, this dilemma's owner may discard a random card from hand to return this dilemma to his or her dilemma pile.

name: Intimidation
text: Randomly select a personnel. Repeat this until you select a personnel of a different species than the first personnel that you selected. Stop each selected personnel.

name: Malfunctioning Door
text: Unless you have 3 Transporters or Strength>36, all your personnel are stopped. If four or more personnel of the same species are stopped by this dilemma, this dilemma's owner may discard a random card from hand to return this dilemma to his or her dilemma pile.

name: Manufactured Triumph
text: Your opponent discards any number of personnel of different species from hand. Unless you have that number of personnel of different species, all your personnel are stopped.

name: Oh No!
text: If you have Cunning>55, lose 5 points. Also, unless you have 2 Astrometrics or Integrity>30 or Strength>30, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Ominous Presence
text: If you have five or more personnel of the same species attempting this mission, this dilemma is cost -2. Randomly select a personnel with Diplomacy or Security. Then choose a different personnel of the same species. Those personnel are stopped.

name: Shadowplay
text: When your opponent reveals this dilemma, he or she may discard a personnel from hand to add 5 to each of this dilemma's attributes requirements (or add 10 if that personnel was an Hologram). Unless you have Programming and Cunning>30 or Treachery and Strength>30, all your personnel are stopped.

name: Audacious Assault
text: Plays in your core. When you are about to play a [Dom] personnel, if you do not command a personnel of that species, he or she is cost -1. Order - Destroy this event to begin combat involving your Breen. If you win, you may place a [Dom] personnel from hand that costs 4 or more aboard your [Dom] ship.

name: Katric Ark
text: Plays in your core. When your personnel begin a mission attempt, you may discard a Vulcan from hand to make each of your Vulcans Cunning +1 until the end of that missions attempt.

name: Rule of Acquisition #194
text: To play this event, you must command three [Fer] personnel. Plays in your core. Order - Give command of your Commodity event to an opponent to take a card from beneath your {Ferenginar} into hand. You may do this only once each turn.

name: The Great Material Continuum
text: To play this event, you must command {Ferenginar}. Draw three cards, then reveal your hand. Choose an opponent to choose one of the revealed non-ship cards to be discarded, then place two cards from hand beneath your Ferenginar. Destroy this event.

name: Unity
text: Plays in your core. While you command personnel of three different species, cards opponents own may not destroy this event. When a player downloads a non-[NA] personnel, if he or she already commands a personnel of the same species, that player must discard a card from hand.

name: Infinite Combinations
text: While your personnel is facing a dilemma, discard a personnel of a different species from hand to make him or her attributes +2 and gain one level of every skill he or she already has until the end of that dilemma.

name: Rule of Acquisition #239
text: Order - Discard a card from hand and place a card from beneath your {Ferenginar} on top of your deck to download a card and place it beneath your Ferenginar.

name: Sense of Obligation
text: Order - Choose an opponent. That opponent scores 5 points and you may destroy one of his or her events.

name: Acquire Captives
skills: Navigation, Transporters, Treachery, Strength>34 and (2 Acquisition or an Orion)
text: When you complete this mission, you may choose an opponent and place a personnel from his or her discard pile that he or she does not command in your brig. (That opponent now commands him or her.)

name: Conceal Unlikely Society
skills: Anthropology, Exobiology, Security, Strength>38 and (2 Treachery or a Klingon)
text: When your personnel complete this mission, you may destroy an opponent's event that costs no more than the number of Klingons involved.

name: Defend Evolutionary Link
skills: Anthropology, Archaeology, Diplomacy, Exobiology, and Integrity>36
text: When your personnel complete this mission, you may place an Alien from hand at your headquarters mission where he or she could be played.

affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
name: Discard By-Product
skills: Engineer, Medical, Navigation, Cunning>34 and (2 Treachery or a Malon)
text: When your personnel complete this mission, you may destroy an event on a non-headquarters mission.

affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
name: Exploit "Drought"
skills: Anthropology, Astrometrics, 2 Treachery, Integrity<25 and (6 Acquisition or Cunning>32)
text: You may not attempt this mission with less than six personnel. Your personnel may not gain skills at this mission.

name: Gather Information
skills: Acquisition, Exobiology, Treachery, Cunning>34 and (2 Anthropology or a Yridian)
text: You may attempt and complete this mission using your [Fed] personnel with these requirements: Medical, Officer, Security, Transporters, and Integrity>34.

name: Penetrate Enemy Lines
skills: Astrometrics, Leadership, Navigation, Strength>34 and (2 Engineer or a Jem'Hadar)
text: When you complete this mission, if at least three different species are involved, you may draw up to seven cards.

name: Recruit Ally
skills: Leadership, Navigation, Security, Strength>36 and (2 Diplomacy or a Breen)
text: When your personnel complete this mission, you may download a personnel.

name: Stage Covert Fleet
skills: 2 Leadership, Navigation, 2 Security, and (Cunning>38 or Strength>38)
text: When you are about to play a [Dom] personnel at your {Founders' Homeworld}, if this mission is complete, you may discard the top card of your deck to play that personnel on your [Dom] ship.

name: Azeni Meressa Resistance Spy
text: While this personnel is facing a dilemma that requires two or more levels of a skill, you may lose 5 points to subtract one level of that skill from that dilemma's requirements.

name: Crom Open-minded
text: When you play this personnel, if you command four missions that require Strength, you may download up to three [Dom] personnel of different species.

name: Draz Overeager
text: When an Assault, Commodity, Infiltration, or Maneuver event you own is destroyed, you may stop your personnel present with a cost of 4 or more to download an Assault, Commodity, Infiltration, or Maneuver event.

name: Fel Hands-on
text: When you fail a mission attempt involving this personnel, you may remove him from the game to unstop up to two stopped Breen and an equal number of stopped [Dom] personnel at that mission.

name: Founder Instigator Unmasked
text: When an opponent's personnel is about to complete a mission, if this personnel is at that mission, you may remove him from the game to add his skills to that mission's requirements until the end of that opponent's turn.

name: Kilana Unctuous Negotiator
skills: Diplomacy Exobiology Geology Medical Transporters Treachery
text: When you play a Changeling at this mission, you may reveal the top four cards of your deck. Take each [Dom] ship revealed into your hand. Replace the remaining cards in any order.

name: Enrique Muniz Dependable Troubleshooter
text: When you play a [DS9] personnel of a species you do not command, you may draw a card. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Haadok
text: While you command an [AU] personnel, you may play this personnel at cost +1 to name a unique personnel. That personnel cannot be killed by dilemmas until the end of this turn.

name: Robin Lefler Pragmatic Specialist
text: When any number of your [TNG] personnel present are about to be stopped by a dilemma that does not require a skill, if a copy of that dilemma is overcome beneath your mission, you may stop this personnel to prevent that.

name: Solok Calculating Rival
text: When you play this personnel, if you command two Vulcans, you may draw three cards.

name: William Patrick Samuels Well-Placed Agent
text: When you play this personnel, you may draw a card for each [Maq] Leadership personnel present (limit 3).

name: Gint Avaricious Author
text: When you play this personnel, you may download three different Commodity events and/or Rule cards.

name: Stol Wealthy Cousin
skills: Acquisition Astrometrics Engineer Geology Physics Programming
text: While this personnel is attempting a mission, he is attributes +1 for each non-Ferengi personnel present (limit +3).

name: Zek Devolved Benefactor
text: While this personnel is facing a dilemma that requires Acquisition or Honor, he and each Acquisition personnel present cannot be randomly selected by that dilemma.

name: Dath
text: To play this personnel, you must command a personnel with a cost of 4 or more.

name: Feqma
text: While this personnel is attempting a mission with an event on it, he is attributes +2.

name: John Doe Emergent Herald
text: When you gain command of this personnel, you may shuffle up to four personnel from your discard pile into their owner's deck.

name: Juliana Tainer Unknowing Automaton
text: When this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may reveal three Androids from hand to make this personnel become a species of your choice until the end of that dilemma.

name: Obrist Temporal Tactician
text: At the start of your first turn, you may discard this card from hand to shuffle your hand into your deck, then draw six cards.

name: Yranac
text: When you play this personnel, if you have not revealed your hand this turn, you may reveal your hand to draw two cards.

name: Ba'el Clutching Two Worlds
text: While this personnel is attempting a mission, she is attributes +1 for each unique Klingon present (limit +4).

name: Gi'ral Reproachful Matriarch
